data.title: Decadent and delicious
data.text: These are absolutely scrumptious with great variety available. The cake is moist and the frosting is really good and the decorations are awesome. You need to enjoy one for yourself!

data.title: Love the macarons!
data.text: I needed a couple dozen macarons (not macaroons) for a party and Cupcake Magic made up a batch of the flavor and color I wanted. They were delicious! And so pretty.

data.title: Got a sweet tooth?  This is your place!
data.text:
Delicious artisanal cupcakes and bakery creations.  Owned by a delightful couple who will talk your ear off if you let them...let them!  Cupcakes are freshly made daily and when they are gone, they are gone.  Until tomorrow!  Plumas Street is a shopping destination on the rise, the chamber is doing their best to revitalize the area, and Cupcake Magic is helping to lead the charge.
Have a chocolate cheesecake cupcake and a coffee...you wont regret it.

data.title: Nice and cozy place to have coffee and that special treat
data.text: The cupcakes are so good and fresh. We definitely go there for our coffee and dessert when in Yuba City.

data.title: Do You Love Cupcakes?
data.text:
When wandering around waiting for our car to be fixed we stopped and went to the Waffle Barn then headed to Plumas Street to kill some time. I always pass by the Cupcake magic but never stopped, until yesterday which was Dec, 31, 2015. 
I tried the chocolate cheesecake. Can't go wrong with cheesecake especially in a cupcake form. It was very good. loved the icing on it. Give this place a try . They have so many different variety of cupcakes, it's hard to decide

data.title: Delicious treats
data.text: I've walked by this place hundreds of times but finally stopped in and I'm so glad I did. They have lots of options and they are awesome! Really delicious tasting. My favorites are the mini cupcakes. They are the best in town and can more than hold their own in any big city. Friendly place as well.

data.title: MOST AMAZING CUPCAKES & TREATS - EVER!!
data.text: THIS PLACE IS AMAZING!  We visit it every time we are in town.  The cupcakes are the best I have ever eaten!  All the ingredients are made from scratch - even the caramel - and it makes such a difference.  They are so moist & delicious.  Every flavor I've had is amazing.  My husband & kids love this place as well.  My kids love the cake pops and chocolate pretzels.  The macarons are also amazing!  Must try the vanilla salted caramel cupcake - IT'S TO DIE FOR!!  LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PLACE!  Can't wait to go back!

data.title: The Cup Cake monster
data.text: Best Cupcakes I've ever tasted, been a regular since they opened, my fav is the carrot cake, mmmmmmmmmmm so good!!!

data.title: late night visit
data.text: We went just before closing to pick up snacks.  Had a variety of their mini cupcakes and all were delicious!  Owner was very friendly and helpful!

data.title: Its a Cupcake
data.text: Would have been better if they werent a bit pricey.  I guess i dont see  the value in paying this much for a cupcake.  It was better than the Cookie Tree however.  I will return I'm sure when the kids need a treat.

data.title: Great cupcakes! The best!
data.text: Cupcake magic makes the best cupcakes in Yuba-Sutter. So many flavors like samosa or the black and white. Great chocolate confections too. Even chocolate covered bacon! The thing that makes this the best is the lady who owns it. She is sooooo sweet (pardon the pun) and helpful that she makes a visit to Cupcake Magic....well....magical!!!

data.title: Amazing cupcakes & more
data.text: I've been to lots of cupcakes places in Sacramento & a few in the bay area and this one beats them all! My favorite is the blackberry cheesecake but there are still a few I haven't tried yet! The cupcakes are huge and not too sweet. The cake pops are also yummy. The owners are always polite & friendly. Great place :)

data.title: Amazing Scones and Vegan Cupcakes!
data.text: I've always received great service with a heart-felt smile here! The vegan cupcakes are out of this world and my family all loved each cupcake they selected.  The scones are also wonderful and there is a bit of eating inside. This is a perfect spot to meet a friend for a snack and a visit.

data.title: Delicious nibbles
data.text:
My husband and I were walking down the "main drag " in Lodi and stumbled upon Cupcake Magic at 6:00 pm on a Tuesday evening. The assortment was limited because of the lateness of the hour but I tried an INCREDIBLE red velvet cupcake and loved each and every heavenly bite. The cupcake was moist and flavorful and the frosting was creamy and delicious.

My husband, who is not a cake guy, tried the ice cream and was disappointed but liked the chocolate covered nuts he selected.

Was this spot a "diet buster"?
YES
Was it worth it?
YES, YES, YES!

data.title: Cupcake
data.text: Great yummiest and great service. I didn't know which to try and got the official cupcake tour. My husband decided on banana split cupcake and I ate a bailey's and cream cupcake.

data.title: 12-pack for the office
data.text: If I'm passing by, I stop by and pick up a 12-pack of assorted mini cupcakes (all the flavors are great) and bring them by the office to surprise my coworkers. Makes everyones afternoon (or at least 12 of them!).

data.title: Service with a smile☆☆☆
data.text: Visited this establishment once again and they never fail to serve there customers the owners are so personable and always so friendly tried a new cupcake and introduced the cupcakes to my co - worker she was impressed love this place!!

data.title: Tiny bites of A-MAZ-ING!
data.text: My parents surprised me by bringing a half-dozen mini cupcakes to my work for my birthday.  Wow!  Deciding what to eat first was hard because they all looked delicious!  In fact, they were all so delicious that it was hard to share them.  The flavor profiles were very creative and the use of fresh fruits was the icing on the cupcake (i.e. Huge, fresh blackberry on top or even strawberry slices).  What a fun concept!
